books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A novel about the serious issues of rape and racial inequality.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale about the dangers of totalitarianism.

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A novel about the American dream and the excesses of the Jazz Age.

books.title: Moby Dick
books.author: Herman Melville
books.description: A novel about the voyage of the whaling ship Pequod and its captain's obsession with a giant whale.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A romantic novel that critiques the British landed gentry at the end of the 18th century.
